name: df-unit
body: |- wceq(cui, cmpt(s0, universe, cima(ccnv(cin(cfv(cdsr, cv(s0)), cfv(cdsr, cfv(coppr, cv(s0))))), csn(cfv(cur, cv(s0))))))
comment: Define the set of units in a ring, that is, all elements with a left and right multiplicative inverse. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
